statements: SELECT * FROM employee_training_certifications;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employee_training_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_training_certifications WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_training_certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_training_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'Project Management' ORDER BY certification_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT employee_id, employee_name, certification_name, DATE_FORMAT(certification_date, '%M %d, %Y') AS formatted_date FROM employee_training_certifications WHERE employee_id = 1001 ORDER BY certification_date ASC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, COUNT(certification_name) AS total_certifications FROM employee_training_certifications GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_certifications > 2
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name FROM employee_training_certifications WHERE certification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employee_training_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01' AND certification_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_name FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name FROM CertificationRecords WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM CertificationRecords ORDER BY certification_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM CertificationRecords WHERE employee_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE employee_id = 102;
SELECT employee_id, training_name FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_id, employee_id, certification_name FROM CertificationRecords WHERE certification_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT training_name, training_date FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM CertificationRecords WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Administrator%';
SELECT * FROM employee_training ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_title FROM employee_training WHERE training_duration > 2;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certification_records WHERE employee_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM skill_development WHERE skill_level >= 3 ORDER BY skill_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, skill_name, skill_level FROM skill_development WHERE employee_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM employee_training ORDER BY training_date DESC, training_duration ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, employee_id FROM certification_records WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, skill_name, skill_level FROM skill_development WHERE skill_level >= 3 ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT training_title, training_date, training_duration FROM employee_training WHERE training_duration > 20;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name, employee_id FROM certification_records ORDER BY certification_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM employee_training;
SELECT employee_name, training_topic FROM employee_training ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_organization FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT * FROM training_topics ORDER BY topic_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_training WHERE training_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, training_topic FROM employee_training WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date < '2021-06-30';

SELECT et.employee_name, tp.topic_name, ec.certification_name FROM employee_training et JOIN training_topics tp ON et.training_topic = tp.topic_name JOIN employee_certifications ec ON et.employee_id = ec.employee_id WHERE et.training_date BETWEEN '2021-05-01' AND '2021-06-30';

SELECT eo.organization_name, ec.certification_name FROM certification_organizations eo JOIN employee_certifications ec ON eo.organization_id = ec.organization_id WHERE ec.certification_date > '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_status = 'Completed';
SELECT training_name, training_date FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_expiry FROM EmployeeCertificationRecords WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT compliance_type, compliance_date, compliance_description FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_type = 'Safety' AND compliance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FactoryAutomationEquipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Robotics' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords ORDER BY training_date DESC, training_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, certification_expiry FROM EmployeeCertificationRecords WHERE certification_expiry >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, compliance_type, compliance_date, compliance_description FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_type = 'Safety' AND compliance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, skill_name, skill_level FROM SkillDevelopmentRecords WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced' ORDER BY skill_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, equipment_status FROM FactoryAutomationEquipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-07-01';
